title: LolManager Enthusiasts!
body:
Hey everyone!

If anyone saw my post yesterday I was seeing how many people had jumped into LolManager?

Long story short - Its about creating your own team and managing it with your players, coaches, managers, sponsors, finances and more while playing Ranked and Sandbox games against other created teams.

I have created a group that you can join for all LolManager enthusiasts to discuss strategies and how to be the best manager possible! - [LolManager Facebook Group](https://www.facebook.com/groups/767486136726927/)

You can also check out Lolmanager here if you haven't seen it already - [LolManager](https://www.lolmanager.gg/ref/YXVQud)
